content.question: A spinner contains 12 regions of equal size. The regions are numbered 1 to 12. Which of the following code segments can be used to simulate the results of spinning the spinner three times and assigns the sum of the values obtained by the three spins to the variable sum ?

choices.label: sum <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> RANDOM(1, 12) + RANDOM(1, 12) + RANDOM(1, 12)

content.answer: sum <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> RANDOM(1, 12) + RANDOM(1, 12) + RANDOM(1, 12)
